title: Earthquake! (PC)
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Earthquakes - California - San Francisco
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Natural disasters
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interactive media
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Multimedia systems
description: Witness the devastation of the powerful forces of mother nature as she lashes out across San Francicso, Mexico City and Alaska, leaving a path of destruction in her wake. Journey also into the Earth to discover why these tragedies occur and why they will continue. This CD ROM also explores areas such as tsunamis and geysers, faults and folds, and quake science, thus providing a useful teaching tool to any study of earth science.
